fields.name: target
fields.doc:
Target element ID, positive if a known element, otherwise:

- 0: document.body
- -1: window
- -2: = unknown

fields.name: clientX
fields.doc: Mouse/touch X position in the local space of the element's bounding rect

fields.name: clientY
fields.doc: Mouse/touch Y position in the local space of the element's bounding rect

fields.name: deltaX
fields.doc: WHEEL event only, scroll X delta

fields.name: deltaY
fields.doc: WHEEL event only, scroll Y delta

fields.name: buttons
fields.doc: Encoded bitmask of currently pressed mouse buttons, see `MouseButton` enum

fields.name: modifiers
fields.doc: Encoded bitmask of currently pressed modifier keys, see `KeyModifier` enum

fields.name: value
fields.doc:
INPUT event only, the value of the targeted input element.
The memory is owned by the DOM API and will be freed immediatedly after the event handler has returned.

fields.name: parent
fields.doc: Parent element ID. If >=0 the new element will be attached to that parent element. Set to -1 to leave new element unattached

fields.name: index
fields.doc: Insertion index for new element or -1 to append (default)

fields.name: dpr
fields.doc: Device pixel ratio for computing physical pixel dimensions, see `getWindowInfo()`
